name: Slave to the Beat
description:
Slave to the Beat is a first-person shooter where the music decides your actions. 

Inspired by the original Doom and modern rhythm games, shoot yourself through a dungeon filled with weird creatures like bizarre spider-squids, enjoy the cool beats and flee the slavery of your mind controlling weapon (or maybe just kill that giant squid thing).

This short game is a submission to the GMTK Gamejam 2020 with the theme “Out of control”.

Developer: Kai Hillenbrand
Music: Nicholas Singer
Art: Sima Spielmann
